name: Connect 4 (itch) (Carbon Shouka)
description:
I wanna make games throughout the year to be shpeedy.

I tried making connect 4 as quickly as possible. I ended up spending about 4 days tryna make my own machine learning AI which I never got to work. The AI now just uses a heuristic to rate which of the 7 columns it thinks is best. 

Anyways it's dun and I'm not gonna make changes to it :)
No audio because I'm not doin' that buh
